channel.title: CVE Feed for BIG-IP -- BIG-IP (ASM)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BIG-IP -- BIG-IP (ASM)

item.title: CVE-2019-6607|2024-08-04T20:23:22.232Z -- big-ip -- big-ip%20%28asm%29
item.description: On BIG-IP ASM 11.5.1-11.5.8, 11.6.1-11.6.3, 12.1.0-12.1.3, 13.0.0-13.1.1.3, and 14.0.0-14.0.0.2, there is a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability in an ASM violation viewed in the Configuration utility. In the worst case, an attacker can store a CSRF which results in code execution as the admin user.
